result.execSummary:
The defendant Michel A Binet was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC AMENDED FROM Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possession of THC AMENDED FROM Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possession of THC AMENDED FROM Maintain Drug Trafficking Place, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for Michel A Binet Sr

Prior: 1025 13th Ave, Union Grove, WI 53182
If unable to post,  ordered to serve  15  consecutive days for contempt.  Debt will remain due and owing.
Per RCSO, DNA collected - 02-23-2016 at 11:40 am
does not plan to seek relief.

Defendant Michel A Binet in court with attorney Helmi Hamad.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Rose Coulthart.
State moves to amend Cts. 1,2&3 to Misd PTHC.
Plea:  Cts. 1,2,3 - NC.
BTC:  Cts. 1,2,3 - GUILTY.  
CFTS, ea ct. conc;
CC+DNA surcharge, provide sample.
$25/mo beg 5-1-16, ftp 15 RCJ for contempt.

Defendant Michel A Binet in court with attorney Helmi Hamad.  Jennifer Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Nancy Szeklinski.
Defendant was not accepted into Drug Court.
Defense req bond mod.
State does not object.
BTC:  Bond mod granted.  Status conference scheduled for February 23, 2016 at 08:30 am.

**PLUS 9,000 SIGNATURE BOND**
Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any alcohol or controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance and random testing at least once every two weeks.  Defendant must attend 1 self-help meeting per day and provide signed proof of attendance.    Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

**AMENDED 1-22-2016:  Defendant is to attend 2 self-help meetings per week and provide signed proof of attendance.**

Defendant Michel A Binet in court with attorney Helmi Hamad.  Jennifer C. Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Rose Coulthart.
Def is being considered for Drug Court.
  Status conference scheduled for January 22, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Status conference scheduled for December 1, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 23, 2015 at 08:15 am.

ATTY Hamad files motion for modification of bail.

DEF: requesting bond modification
ST: no position
BTC: motion to modify bond is denied  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 18, 2015 at 08:15 am.
